programme.title: Egypt U17 - FIFA U17 World Cup - Qatar 2025
programme.desc: كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 ستقام كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 في قطر من 3 حتى 27 نوفمبر. وستكون هذه أول بطولة من خمس بطولات متتالية لكأس العالم تحت 17 سنة تقام في قطر. ستكون هذه النسخة هي الأولى التي يتم لعبها بتنسيق 48 فريقًا بدلاً من البطولات السابقة التي تقام كل عامين والتي تضم 24 فريقًا.

programme.title: Um Salal vs Al Sadd - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W7
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: المملكة العربية السعودية ضد نيوزيلندا - كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة قطر 2025 - المجموعة L
programme.desc: كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 ستقام كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 في قطر من 3 حتى 27 نوفمبر. وستكون هذه أول بطولة من خمس بطولات متتالية لكأس العالم تحت 17 سنة تقام في قطر. ستكون هذه النسخة هي الأولى التي يتم لعبها بتنسيق 48 فريقًا بدلاً من البطولات السابقة التي تقام كل عامين والتي تضم 24 فريقًا.

programme.title: Saint-Raphaël vs Nîmes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Match 3 Women - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuwait 2025
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: Final Match 1 Women - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuwait 2025
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: M1 - ATP 250 Moselle Open 2025
programme.desc: The ATP 250 Moselle Open in Metz, France, is played on indoor hard courts and is one of Europe’s longest-running autumn tournaments. The 2025 edition offers €596,035 in total prize money, with 250 ATP Ranking points awarded to the singles champion. Known for its fast conditions and loyal home crowd, the Metz event often serves as a key lead-up for players targeting the late-season indoor swing

programme.title: Um Salal vs Al Sadd - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W7
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night 37 - 2025
programme.desc: Kryklia vs Agdeve hits Bangkok's Lumpinee Stadium, live in U.S. primetime Fri, Nov 7. The towering Ukrainian Roman Kryklia chases a historic third strap as he meets unbeaten 21-year-old KO artist Samet "The King" Agdeve for the inaugural ONE Heavyweight Kickboxing World Title. Also: Nico "King of the North" Carrillo vs Luke "The Chef" Lessei in featherweight Muay Thai, plus Elbek Alyshov, Carlo "The Bull" Bumina-ang, Jacob Smith, Rambolek and Abdulla Dayakaev.

programme.title: مالي ضد النمسا - كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة قطر 2025 - المجموعة L
programme.desc: كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 ستقام كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 في قطر من 3 حتى 27 نوفمبر. وستكون هذه أول بطولة من خمس بطولات متتالية لكأس العالم تحت 17 سنة تقام في قطر. ستكون هذه النسخة هي الأولى التي يتم لعبها بتنسيق 48 فريقًا بدلاً من البطولات السابقة التي تقام كل عامين والتي تضم 24 فريقًا.

Toulouse vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Basel vs FCSB - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Häcken vs Strasbourg - UEFA Conference League 2025/2026 - MD3
programme.desc: The UEFA Conference League is the third-tier club football tournament organised by UEFA. The new format competition runs for its second season live and exclusive only on beIN. The RB Arena in Leipzig, Germany, is the venue for the Conference League final on 27 May 2026.

programme.title: Benfica vs Bayer 04 Leverkusen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. Paris Saint-Germain are the defending champions. programme.title: Um Salal vs Al Sadd - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W7
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Saint-Raphaël vs Nîmes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Match 3 Women - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuwait 2025
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: Final Match 1 Women - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuwait 2025
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: M1 - ATP 250 Moselle Open 2025
programme.desc: The ATP 250 Moselle Open in Metz, France, is played on indoor hard courts and is one of Europe’s longest-running autumn tournaments. The 2025 edition offers €596,035 in total prize money, with 250 ATP Ranking points awarded to the singles champion. Known for its fast conditions and loyal home crowd, the Metz event often serves as a key lead-up for players targeting the late-season indoor swing

programme.title: Um Salal vs Al Sadd - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W7
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night 37 - 2025
programme.desc: Kryklia vs Agdeve hits Bangkok's Lumpinee Stadium, live in U.S. primetime Fri, Nov 7. The towering Ukrainian Roman Kryklia chases a historic third strap as he meets unbeaten 21-year-old KO artist Samet "The King" Agdeve for the inaugural ONE Heavyweight Kickboxing World Title. Also: Nico "King of the North" Carrillo vs Luke "The Chef" Lessei in featherweight Muay Thai, plus Elbek Alyshov, Carlo "The Bull" Bumina-ang, Jacob Smith, Rambolek and Abdulla Dayakaev.

programme.title: مالي ضد النمسا - كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة قطر 2025 - المجموعة L
programme.desc: كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 ستقام كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 في قطر من 3 حتى 27 نوفمبر. وستكون هذه أول بطولة من خمس بطولات متتالية لكأس العالم تحت 17 سنة تقام في قطر. ستكون هذه النسخة هي الأولى التي يتم لعبها بتنسيق 48 فريقًا بدلاً من البطولات السابقة التي تقام كل عامين والتي تضم 24 فريقًا.

programme.title: Manufacturers Cup - Gran Turismo World Series 2025 - Los Angeles Round
Toulouse vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.
